content.text: Hey, I'm looking forward to the weekend. I'm going to be practicing my makeup for my cosplay costume.
That's awesome! I love cosplay! What character are you dressing up as?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking of either Harley Quinn or Poison Ivy.
Those are both great choices! I've always wanted to be Poison Ivy.
I think I might go with Harley Quinn. She's more my style.
That's a great choice! I'm sure you'll look amazing.
Oh, what's your favorite comic book?
I love all the Batman comics, but my favorite is probably the Dark Knight Returns.
That's a great choice! I love that one too. I'm a huge Batman fan.
Me too! He's my favorite superhero.
Mine too! I love his dark and brooding personality.
I know what you mean. He's so mysterious and complex.
He's definitely one of the most interesting superheroes out there.
I agree! He's definitely my favorite.
